context.text: ;; Jack beat Jill and John, together.
;; Jack beat Jill and John, each.
;; Jack beat Jill and John, jointly.
;; Jack beat Jill and John, separately.
;; Jack beat Jill and John, as a team.
;; Jack beat Jill and John, individually.
;; Jack beat Jill and John, collectively.
;; Jack beat Jill and John, respectively.
